title: SEC 'Squandered a Decade' Rejecting Bitcoin ETFs: Commissioner Hester Peirce
description: Spot Bitcoin ETFs will start trading Thursday, but one crypto-friendly SEC Commissioner says it's a day far too long in coming.

title: Degens Are Already Trading 'Bitcoin ETF' Meme Coinsâ€”On Solana
description: Solana traders are jumping on the Bitcoin ETF news. The meme tokens, unsurprisingly, crashed shortly thereafter.

title: Dissenting SEC commissioner says agency approved spot Bitcoin ETPs, not ETFs
description:
Members of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) commented on the approval of various spot Bitcoin products on Jan. 10. One commissioner, Caroline A. Crenshaw, expressed dissent by raising concerns about fraud and market manipulation as well as broader concerns about Bitcoin. Most notably, she contested the nature of the recent approvals, stating: “I […]

The post Dissenting SEC commissioner says agency approved spot Bitcoin ETPs, not ETFs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin miner Phoenix Group buys $187 million worth of miners from Bitmain
description: Phoenix has disclosed an agreement to purchase $187 million worth of new Bitcoin mining rigs from Bitmain Technologies.

title: Bitcoin decouples from the Nasdaq-100 for the first time after four years
description: Bitcoin is starting to trade more on its sector-specific news and drivers rather than just following wider financial market movements.
